articles.title: Bumrah bowls Rizwan as India take control
articles.description: India's Jasprit Bumrah takes the big wicket of Pakistan's Muhammad Rizwan at the Cricket World Cup in India.
articles.content:
India's Jasprit Bumrah takes the big wicket of Pakistan's Muhammad Rizwan at the Cricket World Cup in India.

articles.title: World Cup: Hosts India bowl first against Pakistan in front of 132,000 fans
articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as India play Pakistan in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.content: India captain Rohit Sharma: "It cannot get bigger than this, no doubt about it. It is a fantastic atmosphere, you look for that and dream about it. We'll experience something really, really special.… [+513 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
